document.full_text: public trust in the japanese government faces its biggest test since world war two over the handling of the nation's nuclear crisis, raising concerns that a breakdown in confidence could fuel panic and chaos if appeals for calm go unheeded.
document.title: japan government losing public trust as nuclear crisis worsens
lines_and_colors: public trust in the japanese government faces its biggest test since world war two over the handling of the nation's nuclear crisis, raising concerns that a breakdown in confidence could fuel panic and chaos if appeals for calm go unheeded.
